batch_role: Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) for group management functionalities
key_features: Encapsulates various group-related data such as member lists, invites, and room information
Utilizes Java records for immutability and concise data representation
Includes JSON serialization configurations to manage null values
project_hints: Part of a group management system
Handles functionalities related to group invitations, member management, and room management
Supports pagination and sorting for group room data
